programme.title: Cody Banks - Agente de Palmo e Meio
programme.desc: Para os amigos e para a família, Cody Banks é um adolescente típico. No entanto, Cody esconde um segredo: faz parte de um programa secreto da CIA para adolescentes.

programme.title: Christmas List
programme.desc: Isobel Gray planeia um conto de fadas natalício com o namorado, incluindo um chalé coberto de neve em Northwest e uma criteriosa lista de desejos das típicas tradições de Natal. Mas quando o namorado desaparece, a lista acaba por se tornar num desafio e um romance tentador vira a sua vida do avesso.

programme.title: Christmas List
programme.desc: Isobel Gray planeia um conto de fadas natalício com o namorado, incluindo um chalé coberto de neve em Northwest e uma criteriosa lista de desejos das típicas tradições de Natal. Mas quando o namorado desaparece, a lista acaba por se tornar num desafio e um romance tentador vira a sua vida do avesso.

programme.title: Morte Num Funeral
programme.desc: A cerimónia fúnebre de um pai de família é perturbada por uma série de incidentes, bem como pelas revelações de um desconhecido a propósito do defunto.

programme.title: Priscilla, Rainha do Deserto
programme.desc: Duas drag queens e uma mulher transgénero viajam para Alice Springs a fim de atuarem num casino. Para lá chegarem, compram um autocarro que batizam como "Priscilla", e passam por imensas peripécias na sua viagem.

programme.title: Grace: Sem Filtros
programme.desc: Aos 18 anos, Grace é uma cantora gospel de grande sucesso na sua igreja. Um dia, é convidada para tentar uma carreira de ídolo pop e ser a nova Katy Perry. Grace parte para Los Angeles, onde as suas crenças serão testadas no concorrido mundo do espetáculo.

programme.title: A Linguagem do Coração
programme.desc: Baseado na história verídica de Marie Heurtin. Ela nasceu surda e cega em França, no final do século XIX, e aos 14 anos é incapaz de comunicar. Contrariando o médico, os pais enviam-na para o Instituto Larnay, onde uma freira ensina Marie a expressar-se.

programme.title: Cody Banks 2: Missão em Londres
programme.desc: Um adolescente, agente da CIA, é enviado para Londres com o objetivo de encontrar o rasto de um espião que tenta vender um microprocessador ultrassecreto.

programme.title: Small Town Christmas
programme.desc: A turné de um livro leva a autora de um bestseller de Natal à cidade do homem que a inspirou a escrever o livro, mas que também a magoou ao deixá-la pendurada.

programme.title: Capitaine Marleau
programme.sub-title: Le Jeune Homme Et La Mort

programme.title: The Horses Of McBride
programme.desc: Nicki descobre dois cavalos presos na neve das Montanhas Rochosas e a sua próxima missão será arranjar uma forma de os salvar. Sem mais opções, pega numa pá e começa a escavar, inspirando o pai, Matt, e o resto da comunidade a juntarem-se para salvar os cavalos, mergulhados no espírito do Natal.

programme.title: A Soldier's Revenge
programme.desc: Perseguido pelos horrores da altura da guerra, o soldado da Guerra Civil transformado em caçador de prémios, Frank Connor, passa o seu tempo pós-guerra a acabar com duas coisas: uísque e fugitivos. Até que duas crianças desesperadas lhe tocam à porta e pedem ajuda para procurar a mãe desaparecida.

programme.title: Tempo para Amar
programme.desc: Um jovem casal de apaixonados consegue ultrapassar todas as barreiras com que se deparam pela frente e construir uma vida que vale a pena ser vivida.

programme.title: Os Miseráveis
programme.desc: Stéphane, acabado de chegar de Cherbourg, vai integrar a Brigada Anti-Crime nos arredores de Paris. É aí que conhece os seus novos colegas de equipa, Chris e Gwada, e onde descobre as tensões entre os diferentes gangues locais.

programme.title: Criminal Minds
Mentes Criminosas
programme.desc: Criminal Minds: Created by Jeff Davis. With Matthew Gray Gubler, Kirsten Vangsness, A.J. Cook, Joe Mantegna. The cases of the F.B.I. programme.title: Ghost In The Shell - Agente do Futuro
programme.desc: Num futuro próximo, Major é a primeira da sua espécie: um ser híbrido entre humano e ciborgue, concebida para ser o soldado perfeito e dedicada a parar os piores e mais perigosos criminosos no mundo.

programme.title: MIB - Homens de Negro
programme.desc: Os agentes Jay e Kay fazem parte do segredo mais bem guardado do universo: MIB - Homens de Negro, uma agência governamental que oficialmente não existe e que controla as atividades extraterrestres na Terra.
Em 480 A.C., o rei de Esparta enfrenta o poderoso exército persa no desfiladeiro das Termópilas. No entanto, uma traição ensombra a confiança cega dos gregos na vitória.

programme.title: Jonah Hex
programme.desc: No velho oeste, um caçador de recompensas esconde o seu bom coração por trás do seu rosto deformado e da sua personalidade forte. Mais uma vítima do terrível Quentin Turnbull, Hex, que deveria ter morrido num atentado contra a sua vida, ressuscitou.... com sede de vingança.

programme.title: Criminal Minds
Mentes Criminosas
programme.desc: Criminal Minds: Created by Jeff Davis. With Matthew Gray Gubler, Kirsten Vangsness, A.J. Cook, Joe Mantegna. The cases of the F.B.I. Category: Crime|Drama|Mystery|Crime|Drama|Mystery|Thriller
https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGE2ZmFkZTYtNjRiOS00ZjE3LThjOWMtZTViZjRmNDFjNTQwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjg4NzAyOTA@._V1_QL75_UX190_CR0,2,190,281_.jpg

programme.title: Plano de Fuga
programme.desc: Ray Breslin, especialista em estruturas de segurança, aceita um desafio: fugir de uma instalação ultrassecreta e de alta tecnologia, "O Túmulo". Mas, uma vez prisioneiro, Breslin descobre que foi enganado e é considerado como um preso de verdade.

programme.title: MIB - Homens de Negro II
programme.desc: Numa corrida contrarrelógio, Kay deverá convencer Jay a alistar-se de novo nos Homens de Negro antes que a Terra seja destruída. A dupla volta a unir-se para criar a melhor defesa contra o que poderá vir a ser o maior desafio de sempre: proteger a Terra da nova escória do Universo.

programme.title: 300: O Início de um Império
programme.desc: O general grego Themistokles tenta unir toda a Grécia ao liderar um ataque que mudará o curso da guerra. Mas o campo de batalha é novo: o mar.

programme.title: O Herói de Hacksaw Ridge
programme.desc: Desmond Doss foi o único soldado americano que, durante a Segunda Guerra Mundial, lutou na frente de batalha sem estar armado, acreditando que matar era errado. Como médico do Exército, evacuou, sozinho, os feridos que tinham ficado em território inimigo.

programme.title: Torque - A Lei do Mais Rápido
programme.desc: As motas são a vida de Cary Ford, mas agora podem ser a sua morte! O gangue "Os Reapers" persegue-o por um crime que não cometeu. Já o líder dos rivais "Hellions" quer apanhá-lo, bem como ao contrabando que julga que Ford lhe roubou. E também o FBI tem uma palavra a dizer...

programme.title: O Ben Está de Volta
programme.desc: Ben Burns é um jovem toxicodependente em tratamento, que regressa a casa, inesperadamente, na véspera de Natal. A mãe recebe-o de braços abertos, mas, durante 24 turbulentas horas, ela fará de tudo para evitar que Ben tenha uma recaída...

programme.title: Um Ano Muito Violento
programme.desc: Em Nova Iorque, o inverno de 1981 foi, estatisticamente, o ano mais perigoso na história da cidade. Neste contexto, um casal procura manter o seu negócio por entre o labirinto político e corrupção industrial das ruas de uma cidade em decadência.

programme.title: Jogos de Poder
programme.desc: A história verídica sobre um congressista texano, Charlie Wilson, com gosto para as bebidas e para as mulheres. Com a ajuda de um agente da CIA, com métodos pouco ortodoxos, a dupla financiou, sozinha, as guerrilhas afegãs nos anos 80, de modo a combater a invasão soviética do território.

programme.title: Soldado Milhões
programme.desc: Aníbal Augusto Milhais é um soldado português da Primeira Guerra Mundial. Na Batalha de La Lys, contrariando ordens superiores, enfrenta sozinho sucessivas ofensivas alemãs de maneira a garantir a retirada dos companheiros.

programme.title: O Mistério da Casa do Relógio
programme.desc: Lewis, de 10 anos, vai morar com o tio numa casa antiga, cheia de rangidos, onde ecoa o misterioso pulsar de um tiquetaque. Mas a cidade estremece com um mundo secreto de magos e bruxas, quando Lewis acorda acidentalmente os mortos.

programme.title: O Segurança do Shopping
programme.desc: Com um coração que nunca desiste, um estômago que não para de dar horas e a promessa de proteger o território: eis Paul Blart, o segurança do shopping. Quando um grupo de bandidos assume o controlo do centro comercial e faz reféns, cabe a Paul, que sempre quis ser polícia, a tarefa de salvar o dia.

programme.title: A Ilha das Cabeças Cortadas
programme.desc: Morgan, uma mulher dedicada à pirataria, herdou um barco, uma tripulação de bandidos e a terceira parte de um mapa que está escrito em latim. Para resolver o problema, compra um escravo educado e versado em latim, William Shaw, mas descobre que há mais alguém a seguir a pista do tesouro.

programme.title: Jogos de Poder
programme.desc: A história verídica sobre um congressista texano, Charlie Wilson, com gosto para as bebidas e para as mulheres. Com a ajuda de um agente da CIA, com métodos pouco ortodoxos, a dupla financiou, sozinha, as guerrilhas afegãs nos anos 80, de modo a combater a invasão soviética do território.

programme.title: Dois é uma Família
programme.desc: Samuel vive uma vida sem responsabilidades, quando se vê com uma filha bebé nos braços para cuidar. Oito anos mais tarde, os dois são inseparáveis, até que a mãe da criança vem quebrar esta harmonia, quando resolve reaparecer para recuperar a filha.

programme.title: Cowboys em Nova Iorque
programme.desc: Dois amigos de infância que são cowboys de rodeo viajam do Novo México até Nova Iorque em busca de um amigo que desapareceu enquanto procurava a filha, que foi levada ilegalmente de Cuba para os EUA.

programme.title: Submarino U-571
programme.desc: Durante a Segunda Guerra Mundial, a Marinha americana combate um submarino alemão com o intuito de lhes roubar um descodificador secreto.

programme.title: A Decisão Mortal
programme.desc: Anna e Tom querem começar uma família, mas vivem dificuldades económicas. Até ao dia em que descobrem o seu inquilino morto e um saco cheio de dinheiro em casa dele. Ao guardar segredo e ficar com o dinheiro, o casal torna-se um alvo a abater.

programme.title: Império
programme.desc: Victor quer escapar ao tráfico de drogas e deixa-se convencer por Jack, um jovem corretor, a investir na Bolsa de Wall Street. Este importante traficante acredita que esta é a sua derradeira oportunidade de vencer na vida, mas, depois de ser traído, não descansará enquanto não conseguir vingar-se...

programme.title: Blackway
programme.desc: Um antigo lenhador vem em auxílio de uma mulher que regressa à sua cidade natal no Noroeste do Pacífico e se vê assediada e perseguida por um ex-polícia transformado em senhor do crime.

programme.title: Super-Homem
programme.desc: O planeta Krypton está perdido. Para salvar a sua raça da extinção Jor-El envia o seu filho bebé num foguete para o planeta Terra. Já adulto, para mascarar as suas capacidades e a sua verdadeira identidade, assume o disfarce de Clark Kent, um jornalista tímido e desastrado, que é o Super-Homem.

programme.title: Conta Comigo
programme.desc: Numa pequena cidade de Oregon, durante os últimos dias do verão de 1959, quatro rapazes partilham o que será a sua última aventura juntos: tentam descobrir onde se encontra o corpo sem vida de um adolescente perdido.

programme.title: Morangos com Açúcar - O Filme
programme.desc: Margarida e Rui, depois de estudarem em Inglaterra, regressam a Portugal para um acampamento de férias, onde reencontram amigos de outros tempos. Aproveitam também para participar num Festival de Verão. Missy M, a Tatiana mete-se no meio do casalinho e vive uma aventura romântica com Rui.

programme.title: Golpe de Amor
programme.desc: Um casal divorciado descobre que o dinheiro do seu plano de reforma foi roubado e concebe um plano para recuperá-lo. Os dois veem-se envolvidos numa perseguição por toda a Europa, num turbilhão de intrigas, perseguições loucas e roubos.

programme.title: Spy Kids - Todo o Tempo do Mundo
programme.desc: Quando o mundo de Marisa, uma ex-agente secreta, fica virado do avesso pela ameaça do vilão TimeKeeper, é obrigada a regressar ao ativo. Com o apoio de Carmen e Juni, e a ajuda de fantásticas armas secretas, Rebecca e Cecil talvez cheguem a tempo de salvar o mundo da terrível ameaça de TimeKeeper...

programme.title: O Segurança do Shopping: Las Vegas
programme.desc: Depois de seis anos a garantir a segurança dos centros comerciais, Paul Blart tem, finalmente, direito a umas merecidas férias e viaja para Las Vegas com a filha adolescente. No entanto, a segurança nunca tira férias e, quando o dever chama, Blart responde...

programme.title: Smurfs: A Aldeia Perdida (V.P.)
programme.desc: Os Smurfs regressam numa aventura totalmente animada! Um misterioso mapa leva Smurfina e os seus melhores amigos Sabichão, Trapalhão e Valentão numa emocionante aventura pela Floresta Proibida, para encontrar uma misteriosa aldeia perdida.

programme.title: Super-Homem II: A Aventura Continua
programme.desc: Super-Homem enfrenta três criminosos do planeta Krypton, o seu planeta natal. Tal como ele, Non, Ursa e Zod são dotados de incríveis poderes e, quando se aliam a Lex Luthor, quase dominam a Terra. Entretanto, o Super-Homem tinha decidido abdicar dos seus poderes para poder casar com Lois Lane.

programme.title: O Ben Está de Volta
programme.desc: Ben Burns é um jovem toxicodependente em tratamento, que regressa a casa, inesperadamente, na véspera de Natal. A mãe recebe-o de braços abertos, mas, durante 24 turbulentas horas, ela fará de tudo para evitar que Ben tenha uma recaída...

programme.title: Pânico no Túnel
programme.desc: O pânico instala-se quando, num túnel de Nova Iorque, há um desmoronamento na ligação entre Manhattan e Nova Jérsia, na sequência de uma explosão. Entretanto, um homem lidera as pessoas presas no interior e tenta que todos consigam sair em segurança.

programme.title: Resgate
programme.desc: Um milionário proprietário de uma companhia de aviação descobre que o seu filho, de nove anos, foi sequestrado e pedem-lhe um resgate de dois milhões de dólares. Inicialmente prontifica-se a pagar o resgate, mas quando conclui que vão matar o seu filho após o pagamento, decide reverter o jogo.

programme.title: Assassinos Substitutos
programme.desc: A hesitação de um assassino a soldo em cumprir a missão de morte de que foi incumbido coloca-o na mira de implacáveis atiradores encarregues de o eliminar.

programme.title: O Homem Que Brilha
programme.desc: Dois polícias são obrigados a trabalhar juntos para tentar descobrir um assassino conhecido como "Homem de Família".

programme.title: Uma Coroa Pelo Natal
programme.desc: Allie, uma funcionária despedida de um hotel luxuosa em Nova Iorque, aceita um novo emprego como governanta de uma jovem que faz parte de uma família poderosa na Europa.

programme.title: Money Monster
programme.desc: Lee Gates, um apresentador de televisão que é uma espécie de "guru" de Wall Street, é mantido refém com a sua equipa e produtora, durante a emissão do seu programa em direto, por um investidor irado. Em tempo real, terão de encontrar forma de se manterem vivos e desvendarem uma teia de mentiras.

programme.title: Outlander
Outlander
programme.desc: Outlander: Created by Ronald D. Moore. With Caitriona Balfe, Sam Heughan, Duncan Lacroix, Sophie Skelton. The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Her daily routine is between solving crimes, taking out fights with her much younger female police superior officer, getting her kids to school - in addition - handling their problems too and keeping her team in line. It's a very funny and witty series with a lot of french charm and intelligent story writing. Not another dull crime series all over again. It's like a fresh french breeze on the TV screen. programme.title: Candice Renoir
Candice Renoir
programme.sub-title: C'Est Dans Le Malheur Qu'On Reconnait Ses Amis
programme.desc: Candice Renoir: Created by Robin Barataud, Brigitte Peskine, Solen Roy-Pagenault. With Cécile Bois, Raphaël Lenglet, Clara Antoons, Ali Marhyar. The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Her daily routine is between solving crimes, taking out fights with her much younger female police superior officer, getting her kids to school - in addition - handling their problems too and keeping her team in line. It's a very funny and witty series with a lot of french charm and intelligent story writing. Not another dull crime series all over again. It's like a fresh french breeze on the TV screen. Candice is like a female Columbo version in high heels, handbag pink scarf and a 9mm in her holster." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt2819924/","name":"Candice Renoir","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM3YzUxM2UtZjIyMC00Zjg5LTk0NTMtNGQ3ZWQ0ODhlMTJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjc0NTExNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. IMDb data; ttnr: 2819924, Title: Candice Renoir, --- Description: Candice Renoir: Created by Robin Barataud, Brigitte Peskine, Solen Roy-Pagenault. With Cécile Bois, Raphaël Lenglet, Clara Antoons, Ali Marhyar. The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Her daily routine is between solving crimes, taking out fights with her much younger female police superior officer, getting her kids to school - in addition - handling their problems too and keeping her team in line. It's a very funny and witty series with a lot of french charm and intelligent story writing. Not another dull crime series all over again. It's like a fresh french breeze on the TV screen. programme.title: Candice Renoir
Candice Renoir
programme.sub-title: Oeil Pour Oeil et le Monde Deviendra Aveugle
programme.desc: Candice Renoir: Created by Robin Barataud, Brigitte Peskine, Solen Roy-Pagenault. With Cécile Bois, Raphaël Lenglet, Clara Antoons, Ali Marhyar. The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Her daily routine is between solving crimes, taking out fights with her much younger female police superior officer, getting her kids to school - in addition - handling their problems too and keeping her team in line. It's a very funny and witty series with a lot of french charm and intelligent story writing. Not another dull crime series all over again. It's like a fresh french breeze on the TV screen. programme.title: Um Doce Romance de Natal
programme.desc: Quando Holly, uma estilista de culinária, descobre que a dona da sua padaria preferida se vai reformar e promove um concurso para encontrar a sua sucessora, ela entra no concurso. Mas é obrigada a unir forças com um chef rival para tentar ganhar.

programme.title: Anjo Refilão
programme.desc: Allison Pyke transformou-se num anjo, mas ainda está presa na Terra, mais precisamente em Nova Iorque. Ela não sabe como entrar no Céu, mas terá a ajuda do seu "anjo mentor".

programme.title: Murder, She Baked: Apenas Sobremesas
programme.desc: Hannah Swensen fica felicíssima quando é convidada para o primeiro Concurso de Sobremesas de Eden Lake, mas quando outro membro do júri, o Treinador Boyd Watson, é encontrado assassinado, Hannah propõe-se mais uma vez a descobrir quem é o assassino.

programme.title: Hailey Dean Mystery: Homicídio, Com Amor
programme.desc: Hailey Dean, uma antiga procuradora do Ministério Público, é agora psicoterapeuta. Quando uma paciente sua é interrogada sobre as mortes repentinas dos seus pais, o antigo trabalho de Hailey revela-se útil para provar a sua inocência.

programme.title: Natal em Nashville
programme.desc: Quando Rebecca Miller regressa a casa, ao Tennesse, duas semanas antes do Natal, a última coisa que esperava era rever o seu melhor amigo de infância.

programme.title: A Ajudante do Pai Natal
programme.desc: Holly regressa a casa para o Natal e vai trabalhar como duende na loja da família, onde conhece o Pai Natal substituto e se apaixona inesperadamente.

programme.title: Amigos Coloridos
programme.desc: Jamie, uma executiva de recursos humanos, tenta convencer um potencial candidato, Dylan, a mudar-se para Nova Iorque. Apesar da atração mútua, depressa chegam à conclusão de que representam tudo aquilo que sempre quiseram evitar numa relação. Por isso, decidem ser apenas amigos... coloridos.

programme.title: Edição de Natal
programme.desc: O Natal aproxima-se e Jackie, uma jornalista promissora, encontra uma oportunidade inesperada: um jornal de uma pequena cidade do Alasca é entregue gratuitamente a quem se comprometer a continuar a editá-lo.

programme.title: The Night Shift: Turno da Noite
Candice Renoir
Candice Renoir
programme.sub-title: C'Est Dans Le Malheur Qu'On Reconnait Ses Amis
programme.desc: Candice Renoir: Created by Robin Barataud, Brigitte Peskine, Solen Roy-Pagenault. With Cécile Bois, Raphaël Lenglet, Clara Antoons, Ali Marhyar. The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Her daily routine is between solving crimes, taking out fights with her much younger female police superior officer, getting her kids to school - in addition - handling their problems too and keeping her team in line. It's a very funny and witty series with a lot of french charm and intelligent story writing. Not another dull crime series all over again. It's like a fresh french breeze on the TV screen. Candice is like a female Columbo version in high heels, handbag pink scarf and a 9mm in her holster." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt2819924/","name":"Candice Renoir","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM3YzUxM2UtZjIyMC00Zjg5LTk0NTMtNGQ3ZWQ0ODhlMTJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjc0NTExNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. programme.title: Candice Renoir
Candice Renoir
programme.desc: Candice Renoir: Created by Robin Barataud, Brigitte Peskine, Solen Roy-Pagenault. With Cécile Bois, Raphaël Lenglet, Clara Antoons, Ali Marhyar. The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Her daily routine is between solving crimes, taking out fights with her much younger female police superior officer, getting her kids to school - in addition - handling their problems too and keeping her team in line. It's a very funny and witty series with a lot of french charm and intelligent story writing. Not another dull crime series all over again. It's like a fresh french breeze on the TV screen. Candice is like a female Columbo version in high heels, handbag pink scarf and a 9mm in her holster." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt2819924/","name":"Candice Renoir","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM3YzUxM2UtZjIyMC00Zjg5LTk0NTMtNGQ3ZWQ0ODhlMTJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjc0NTExNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Candice is a modern mom with an active love life. IMDb data; ttnr: 2819924, Title: Candice Renoir, --- Description: Candice Renoir: Created by Robin Barataud, Brigitte Peskine, Solen Roy-Pagenault. With Cécile Bois, Raphaël Lenglet, Clara Antoons, Ali Marhyar. The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Her daily routine is between solving crimes, taking out fights with her much younger female police superior officer, getting her kids to school - in addition - handling their problems too and keeping her team in line. It's a very funny and witty series with a lot of french charm and intelligent story writing. Not another dull crime series all over again. It's like a fresh french breeze on the TV screen. Candice is like a female Columbo version in high heels, handbag pink scarf and a 9mm in her holster." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt2819924/","name":"Candice Renoir","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM3YzUxM2UtZjIyMC00Zjg5LTk0NTMtNGQ3ZWQ0ODhlMTJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjc0NTExNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. programme.title: O Natal de Eve
programme.desc: Uma gestora escolar interina é colocada numa situação difícil quando é encarregue de encerrar o programa musical falhado de uma escola e tem de enfrentar o seu passado musical.

programme.title: Natal em Conway
programme.desc: Para surpreender a sua mulher, que precisa de cuidados médicos permanentes, Duncan Mayor quer colocar uma roda gigante no quintal de casa. Mas o seu vizinho bisbilhoteiro fará tudo para tentar impedi-lo.

programme.title: Hailey Dean Mystery: Homicídio, Com Amor
programme.desc: Hailey Dean, uma antiga procuradora do Ministério Público, é agora psicoterapeuta. Quando uma paciente sua é interrogada sobre as mortes repentinas dos seus pais, o antigo trabalho de Hailey revela-se útil para provar a sua inocência.

programme.title: Hailey Dean Mystery: Herança Fatal
programme.desc: Hailey, uma antiga procuradora do Ministério Público, utiliza as suas competências e os seus contactos quando a sua amiga Pam desaparece enquanto tratava de vender a grande propriedade dos pais, já falecidos.

programme.title: Natal para Sempre
programme.desc: Quando a executiva da área do marketing Lucy descobre que herdou a loja de artigos de Natal do avô, a "Forever Christmas", viaja de regresso a casa para apoiar a loja no seu último Natal antes de a vender a uma conhecida empresa de artigos de desporto e lazer.

programme.title: Melodia de Natal
programme.desc: O dom da música transporta as pessoas para outro tempo e lugar, onde descobrem os seus sentimentos mais verdadeiros. Um professor de música ajuda uma jovem recém-chegada à cidade a compor uma canção para o espetáculo de Natal da comunidade.

programme.title: The Operative - Agente Infiltrada
programme.desc: Contratada pela Mossad como agente infiltrada no Teerão, Rachel passa por professora de inglês e traça a sua missão: aceder à empresa de produtos eletrónicos e intermediar a venda de componentes nucleares defeituosos aos Serviços Secretos Iranianos.

programme.title: Operações Especiais
programme.desc: Um agente veterano e o seu parceiro são destacados para uma prisão. Ali, têm de supervisionar a chegada de duas misteriosas prisioneiras, mas, quando o local é atacado por mercenários, os agentes descobrem a verdadeira identidade daquelas duas mulheres.

programme.title: The Contractor
programme.desc: Atarefada a remodelar a casa com o marido e a filha, Elizabeth contrata um empreiteiro, Javier, para a ajudar. Mas com o correr do tempo ela começa a suspeitar que ele tem uma agenda escondida e que já tinha a família na mira há bastante tempo.

programme.title: Devota Com Pouca Sorte
programme.desc: Carmen Ruano dedicou toda a sua vida à confraria de Nossa Senhora de Santa Cruz da Caridade e da Esperança. Agora que o presidente da confraria se vai reformar, surge a oportunidade perfeita para tomar as rédeas e mostrar o seu valor. Mas nem tudo corre de feição...

programme.title: O Amor é Um Lugar Estranho
programme.desc: Bob é uma estrela de cinema a rodar um anúncio, Charlotte uma jovem que viaja com o marido, um fotógrafo viciado em trabalho. São os dois norte-americanos, mas cruzam-se no bar de um hotel em Tóquio. E de um encontro fortuito vai nascer uma forte amizade...

programme.title: Happy Feet (V.P.)
programme.desc: Na Antártida, no mundo dos pinguins, os animais encontram a sua alma gémea através de canções. No entanto, um deles nasceu sem a habilidade vocal... mas dança sapateado como ninguém!

programme.title: Cinema Paraíso
programme.desc: Depois de saber da morte de um velho amigo, o cineasta Salvatore Di Vita recorda a sua infância e adolescência na Sicília. Na altura, "Totò" vivia fascinado pela cabina mágica de Alfredo, o mal-humorado projecionista do cinema da vila: o Cinema Paraíso.

programme.title: Inferno Vermelho
programme.desc: O inexpressivo agente russo Ivan Danko persegue um traficante de droga de Moscovo a Chicago, onde faz parceria com o agente Art Ridzik, cuja ética profissional é bastante mais relaxada.

programme.title: Jogo de Espiões
programme.desc: Um operativo da CIA, Nathan Muir, está prestes a reformar-se quando descobre que o seu protegido, Tom Bishop, foi preso na China por espionagem. Nada estranho aos mecanismos de funcionamento da CIA, Muir enceta todos os esforços para libertar Bishop.

programme.title: Scott Pilgrim Contra o Mundo
programme.desc: Scott Pilgrim é um rapaz de 22 anos que toca numa banda. Ele acaba de conhecer a rapariga dos seus sonhos, Ramona Flowers. O único entrave para ganhar o seu coração? Os sete maléficos ex-namorados preparados para o matar, que terá de enfrentar.

programme.title: O Medalhão
programme.desc: O detetive Eddie Yang sofre um acidente e morre, mas volta à vida com a ajuda de um medalhão, que dá poderes sobrenaturais ao seu detentor. Em conjunto com uma agente da Interpol, Eddie vai tentar descobrir os segredos do artefacto e derrotar o malvado "Cabeça de Cobra".

programme.title: Escola para Totós
programme.desc: Um jovem muito inseguro resolve entrar num curso para aumentar a sua determinação e autoestima e conseguir declarar-se a Amanda, só que tudo se torna mais complicado quando o próprio professor lhe vai fazer concorrência na conquista dos afetos da rapariga.

programme.title: Don Jon
programme.desc: Jon Martello é um tipo de Nova Jérsia que se importa com o seu corpo, a família, os amigos, a sua igreja e, claro, mulheres. Os amigos até o tratam por Don Jon. Insatisfeito, embarca numa jornada em busca de uma vida sexual mais gratificante.

programme.title: Escape
programme.desc: Carol, mulher e parceira do crime do hábil ladrão Doc McCoy, fará tudo o que for necessário para livrá-lo de uma pesada sentença numa penitenciária mexicana. Isso inclui levarem a cabo um roubo de grandes proporções, em que escapar com vida vai ser o mais difícil...

programme.title: Mandy
programme.desc: Red e Mandy levam uma vida tranquila numa cabana isolada junto a um lago do Colorado. Um dia, a sua casa é invadida por membros de uma seita religiosa que matam Mandy e deixam Red à beira da morte. Traumatizado, apenas uma coisa o mantém preso à vida: um intenso desejo de punir os responsáveis.

programme.title: Combate ao Passado
programme.desc: O agente Michael Dixon patrulha a fronteira entre os EUA e o México. A sua vida vai dar uma reviravolta quando a sua mulher e a filha são ameaçadas de morte por um gangue de Los Angeles a que ele outrora pertenceu e que o quer forçar a ajudar a traficar drogas entre os dois países.

programme.title: Le Chant du Loup - Ameaça em Alto Mar
programme.desc: Chanteraide tem o raro dom de conseguir identificar todos os sons que ouve. A bordo de um submarino nuclear francês, tudo depende dele, só que, reputado como infalível, ele acaba por cometer um erro que coloca toda a equipa em perigo de morte.

programme.title: Loucos e Fãs
programme.desc: Em 1998, um grupo de fãs da saga "Star Wars" viaja até ao Rancho Skywalker para roubar uma cópia do, então ainda por estrear, "Star Wars: Episódio I - A Ameaça Fantasma".

programme.title: Scott Pilgrim Contra o Mundo
programme.desc: Scott Pilgrim é um rapaz de 22 anos que toca numa banda. Ele acaba de conhecer a rapariga dos seus sonhos, Ramona Flowers. O único entrave para ganhar o seu coração? Os sete maléficos ex-namorados preparados para o matar, que terá de enfrentar.

programme.title: O Guarda-Fraldas em Apuros
programme.desc: Apesar das dificuldades financeiras, dois pais fazem de tudo para manterem o acampamento que planearam com os miúdos. Porém, a indisciplina pede medidas extra!

programme.title: Hotel Mumbai
programme.desc: A história verídica do ataque terrorista ao Hotel Taj, em Mumbai. O staff do hotel arriscou as suas vidas para manter toda a gente segura e também as outras pessoas fizeram sacrifícios impensáveis para se protegerem a si e às suas famílias.

programme.title: Roman J. Israel, Esq.
programme.desc: Roman Israel é um advogado idealista que faz de tudo por um julgamento justo. Mas quando é demitido, aceita o convite de outra firma, com a promessa de uma vida de luxo. No entanto, Israel descobre um esquema de bastidores que precisa de medidas extremas...

programme.title: Estrada de Fogo
programme.desc: Por entre uma melancólica paisagem de rock 'n' roll, o bando de motociclistas Bombers, liderado pelo perverso Raven Shaddock, rapta a diva Ellen Aim. A esperança dela na salvação repousa em improváveis heróis: o soldado da fortuna Tom Cody e a sua companheira, a vigorosa amiga da bebida, McCoy.

programme.title: O Turista
programme.desc: Frank, um pacato norte-americano de férias em Veneza, conhece Elise, uma mulher que esconde um misterioso segredo. A sua relação rapidamente se transforma numa complicada teia de perigos e enganos, quando se veem perseguidos pela Interpol, pela polícia italiana e por assassinos russos.

programme.title: Que Horas Ela Volta?
programme.desc: Val, uma empregada interna que trabalha numa casa abastada de São Paulo, vê a sua vida virada do avesso com a chegada da sua filha Jéssica, que procura ingressar na universidade, e que vai destruir todos os equilíbrios de poder daquele espaço.

programme.title: Tropa de Elite
programme.desc: Desgastado pelo cruel combate ao tráfico de droga em São Paulo, o Capitão Nascimento deve escolher o seu sucessor para liderar a tropa de elite.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
CSI: Miami
programme.desc:
CSI: Miami: Created by Ann Donahue, Carol Mendelsohn, Anthony E. Zuiker. With David Caruso, Emily Procter, Adam Rodriguez, Rex Linn. The cases of the Miami-Dade, Florida police department's Crime Scene Investigations unit." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0313043/","name":"CSI: Miami","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTU3ZTI5ZGEtYjhiMy00ODU4LTgyM2UtNDhlYjBhMjc4MjIwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTYzMDM0NTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"The cases of the Miami-Dade, Florida police department's Crime Scene Investigations unit.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0313043/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"eamon-hennedy"},"dateCreated":"2003-10-28","inLanguage":"English","name":"Not as good as original, but still worth watching.","reviewBody":"Spin-off shows are very strange television projects. In some cases they work, like Angel which has become a show of its own. On the other hand the Star Trek spin-offs (more so the later ones) have becoming mere clones of the show they have spawned from. It is difficult to make it work. You can try and be different and the fan base from the originating show could hate you. Be too similar and the counter effect it that many will call it nothing but a clone. While CSI:Miami is more or less the same show as CSI:Crime Scene Investigation it is still a series that is well worth watching and most of it is down to the reasons that the originating series was worth watching. Fantastic writing, feature film production values and a good cast. While in Crime Scene Investigation the casting is first class here were are merely in good territory. The cast here don't seem to share the same chemistry as Grissom and friends, although whether or not this is deliberate I'm not sure.

With regards to casting what they do have in common is a superb central male lead. David Caruso is a fine actor, was so in the first season of NYPD Blue. Here he is incredible. Unlike Grissom, Horatio Crane (the best name ever for the main character in a television show) is more speculative, he will be more open to hunches than just considering the evidence. The manner in which is delivers his dialog is controlled mannered. If Grissom is the Fox Mulder of CSI, then Crane is undoubtedly the Frank Black. The supporting actors themselves are very good. Kim Delaney was watchable if a little too glossy while former West Wing actress Emily Procter once again brings a wealth of quirky charm that she likewise did with Ainsley in the White House drama.

Of course the biggest change here is the location. Instead of the bright lights of Las Vegas we have the sun shine of Miami. Ironically whereas Crime Scene Investigation would be predominantly set during night time, Miami is set more in the day light hours and with it comes a higher level of violence. In Ireland the channel that broadcasts the show frequently put out a warning before hand, something that never befalls the originating series. What we get here are episodes involving body parts falling of out dead sharks, scenes of autopsies that are more graphic and stories that are slightly more darker (the show itself is broadcast at 10pm in America).

While the show is no Angel it isn't Star Trek:Voyager either. It is hugely entertaining and the stories are frequently entertaining and well produced. What it lacks though is the warmness of the Las Vegas team. Horatio, in the same way as Frank Black, is less emotional and more controlled over his thoughts, whereas the Las Vegas equivalent would be putting heart and soul into the cases they were fighting for. In saying that the show is still worth watching and is perhaps the first step in what is looking like a growing franchise."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":55781,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2002-09-23","keywords":"place name in title,city name in title,city in title,united states of america,usa","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000325/","name":"David Caruso"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0698346/","name":"Emily Procter"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0735226/","name":"Adam Rodriguez"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0054762/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0183875/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0048735/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0231929/","name":"Ann Donahue"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0578856/","name":"Carol Mendelsohn"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0958499/","name":"Anthony E. Zuiker"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"CSI: Miami: Complete Season 8","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi320379929","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWU1NzhhNjItMzQ5ZC00YmFmLWEwMmYtMWVlMjFkNjdkZGNiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWU1NzhhNjItMzQ5ZC00YmFmLWEwMmYtMWVlMjFkNjdkZGNiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for CSI: Miami - Complete Season 08"}}</script><metacontent="

The cases of the Miami-Dade, Florida police department's Crime Scene Investigations unit." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0313043/","name":"CSI: Miami","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTU3ZTI5ZGEtYjhiMy00ODU4LTgyM2UtNDhlYjBhMjc4MjIwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTYzMDM0NTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"The cases of the Miami-Dade, Florida police department's Crime Scene Investigations unit.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0313043/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"eamon-hennedy","dateCreated":"2003-10-28","inLanguage":"English","name":"Not as good as original, but still worth watching.","reviewBody":"Spin-off shows are very strange television projects. In some cases they work, like Angel which has become a show of its own. On the other hand the Star Trek spin-offs (more so the later ones) have becoming mere clones of the show they have spawned from. It is difficult to make it work. You can try and be different and the fan base from the originating show could hate you. Be too similar and the counter effect it that many will call it nothing but a clone. While CSI:Miami is more or less the same show as CSI:Crime Scene Investigation it is still a series that is well worth watching and most of it is down to the reasons that the originating series was worth watching. Fantastic writing, feature film production values and a good cast. While in Crime Scene Investigation the casting is first class here were are merely in good territory. The cast here don't seem to share the same chemistry as Grissom and friends, although whether or not this is deliberate I'm not sure.

With regards to casting what they do have in common is a superb central male lead. David Caruso is a fine actor, was so in the first season of NYPD Blue. Here he is incredible. Unlike Grissom, Horatio Crane (the best name ever for the main character in a television show) is more speculative, he will be more open to hunches than just considering the evidence. The manner in which is delivers his dialog is controlled mannered. If Grissom is the Fox Mulder of CSI, then Crane is undoubtedly the Frank Black. The supporting actors themselves are very good. Kim Delaney was watchable if a little too glossy while former West Wing actress Emily Procter once again brings a wealth of quirky charm that she likewise did with Ainsley in the White House drama.

Of course the biggest change here is the location. Instead of the bright lights of Las Vegas we have the sun shine of Miami. Ironically whereas Crime Scene Investigation would be predominantly set during night time, Miami is set more in the day light hours and with it comes a higher level of violence. In Ireland the channel that broadcasts the show frequently put out a warning before hand, something that never befalls the originating series. What we get here are episodes involving body parts falling of out dead sharks, scenes of autopsies that are more graphic and stories that are slightly more darker (the show itself is broadcast at 10pm in America).

While the show is no Angel it isn't Star Trek:Voyager either. It is hugely entertaining and the stories are frequently entertaining and well produced. What it lacks though is the warmness of the Las Vegas team. Horatio, in the same way as Frank Black, is less emotional and more controlled over his thoughts, whereas the Las Vegas equivalent would be putting heart and soul into the cases they were fighting for. In saying that the show is still worth watching and is perhaps the first step in what is looking like a growing franchise.","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":55781,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2002-09-23","keywords":"place name in title,city name in title,city in title,united states of america,usa","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000325/","name":"David Caruso","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0698346/","name":"Emily Procter","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0735226/","name":"Adam Rodriguez"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0054762/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0183875/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0048735/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0231929/","name":"Ann Donahue","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0578856/","name":"Carol Mendelsohn","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0958499/","name":"Anthony E. programme.title: CSI: Miami
CSI: Miami
programme.desc:
CSI: Miami: Created by Ann Donahue, Carol Mendelsohn, Anthony E. Zuiker. With David Caruso, Emily Procter, Adam Rodriguez, Rex Linn. The cases of the Miami-Dade, Florida police department's Crime Scene Investigations unit." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0313043/","name":"CSI: Miami","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTU3ZTI5ZGEtYjhiMy00ODU4LTgyM2UtNDhlYjBhMjc4MjIwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTYzMDM0NTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"The cases of the Miami-Dade, Florida police department's Crime Scene Investigations unit.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0313043/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"eamon-hennedy"},"dateCreated":"2003-10-28","inLanguage":"English","name":"Not as good as original, but still worth watching.","reviewBody":"Spin-off shows are very strange television projects. In some cases they work, like Angel which has become a show of its own. On the other hand the Star Trek spin-offs (more so the later ones) have becoming mere clones of the show they have spawned from. It is difficult to make it work. You can try and be different and the fan base from the originating show could hate you. Be too similar and the counter effect it that many will call it nothing but a clone. While CSI:Miami is more or less the same show as CSI:Crime Scene Investigation it is still a series that is well worth watching and most of it is down to the reasons that the originating series was worth watching. Fantastic writing, feature film production values and a good cast. While in Crime Scene Investigation the casting is first class here were are merely in good territory. The cast here don't seem to share the same chemistry as Grissom and friends, although whether or not this is deliberate I'm not sure.

With regards to casting what they do have in common is a superb central male lead. David Caruso is a fine actor, was so in the first season of NYPD Blue. Here he is incredible. Unlike Grissom, Horatio Crane (the best name ever for the main character in a television show) is more speculative, he will be more open to hunches than just considering the evidence. The manner in which is delivers his dialog is controlled mannered. If Grissom is the Fox Mulder of CSI, then Crane is undoubtedly the Frank Black. The supporting actors themselves are very good. Kim Delaney was watchable if a little too glossy while former West Wing actress Emily Procter once again brings a wealth of quirky charm that she likewise did with Ainsley in the White House drama.

Of course the biggest change here is the location. Instead of the bright lights of Las Vegas we have the sun shine of Miami. Ironically whereas Crime Scene Investigation would be predominantly set during night time, Miami is set more in the day light hours and with it comes a higher level of violence. In Ireland the channel that broadcasts the show frequently put out a warning before hand, something that never befalls the originating series. What we get here are episodes involving body parts falling of out dead sharks, scenes of autopsies that are more graphic and stories that are slightly more darker (the show itself is broadcast at 10pm in America).

While the show is no Angel it isn't Star Trek:Voyager either. It is hugely entertaining and the stories are frequently entertaining and well produced. What it lacks though is the warmness of the Las Vegas team. Horatio, in the same way as Frank Black, is less emotional and more controlled over his thoughts, whereas the Las Vegas equivalent would be putting heart and soul into the cases they were fighting for. In saying that the show is still worth watching and is perhaps the first step in what is looking like a growing franchise."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":55781,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2002-09-23","keywords":"place name in title,city name in title,city in title,united states of america,usa","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000325/","name":"David Caruso"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0698346/","name":"Emily Procter"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0735226/","name":"Adam Rodriguez"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0054762/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0183875/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0048735/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0231929/","name":"Ann Donahue"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0578856/","name":"Carol Mendelsohn"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0958499/","name":"Anthony E. Zuiker"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"CSI: Miami: Complete Season 8","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi320379929","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWU1NzhhNjItMzQ5ZC00YmFmLWEwMmYtMWVlMjFkNjdkZGNiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWU1NzhhNjItMzQ5ZC00YmFmLWEwMmYtMWVlMjFkNjdkZGNiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for CSI: Miami - Complete Season 08"}}</script><metacontent="

programme.desc: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation: Created by Anthony E. Zuiker. With George Eads, Eric Szmanda, Robert David Hall, Paul Guilfoyle. Series following an elite team of police forensic evidence investigation experts as they work their cases in Las Vegas." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0247082/","name":"CSI: Crime Scene Investigation","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjRlZjFmNTktYzg0ZC00OWJlLWJlN2EtOGQ1OTRiOTFiMWE3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTA4NzY1MzY@._V1_.jpg","description":"Series following an elite team of police forensic evidence investigation experts as they work their cases in Las Vegas.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0247082/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"kidcurry1967"},"dateCreated":"2000-12-07","inLanguage":"English","name":"Outstanding!!!","reviewBody":"C.S.I. is the best new show of the 2000 season! William L. Petersen is the coolest of the cool as Gil Grissom. I've followed his career since I first saw him in To Live and Die in L.A. He's an amazing actor and he heads up a cast of amazing actors as well. This show really keeps you on the edge of your seat as the investigators literally take a crime scene that appears to leave them with nothing to go on. The investigators take nothing and turn it into something amazing as each crime is solved right in front of you and you as the viewer, never see it coming! Wow! I hope this is one show CBS will pick up year after year!"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":81434,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2000-10-06","keywords":"crime scene investigation,las vegas nevada,crime lab,police,detective","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000401/","name":"Laurence Fishburne"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001339/","name":"Marg Helgenberger"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0247040/","name":"George Eads"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0054762/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0183875/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0048735/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0958499/","name":"Anthony E. William L. Petersen is the coolest of the cool as Gil Grissom. I've followed his career since I first saw him in To Live and Die in L.A. He's an amazing actor and he heads up a cast of amazing actors as well. This show really keeps you on the edge of your seat as the investigators literally take a crime scene that appears to leave them with nothing to go on. The investigators take nothing and turn it into something amazing as each crime is solved right in front of you and you as the viewer, never see it coming! Wow! I hope this is one show CBS will pick up year after year!","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":81434,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2000-10-06","keywords":"crime scene investigation,las vegas nevada,crime lab,police,detective","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000401/","name":"Laurence Fishburne","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001339/","name":"Marg Helgenberger","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0247040/","name":"George Eads"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0054762/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0183875/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0048735/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0958499/","name":"Anthony E. Series following an elite team of police forensic evidence investigation experts as they work their cases in Las Vegas." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0247082/","name":"CSI: Crime Scene Investigation","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjRlZjFmNTktYzg0ZC00OWJlLWJlN2EtOGQ1OTRiOTFiMWE3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTA4NzY1MzY@._V1_.jpg","description":"Series following an elite team of police forensic evidence investigation experts as they work their cases in Las Vegas.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0247082/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"kidcurry1967","dateCreated":"2000-12-07","inLanguage":"English","name":"Outstanding!!!","reviewBody":"C.S.I. is the best new show of the 2000 season! William L. Petersen is the coolest of the cool as Gil Grissom. I've followed his career since I first saw him in To Live and Die in L.A. He's an amazing actor and he heads up a cast of amazing actors as well. This show really keeps you on the edge of your seat as the investigators literally take a crime scene that appears to leave them with nothing to go on. The investigators take nothing and turn it into something amazing as each crime is solved right in front of you and you as the viewer, never see it coming! Wow! programme.title: MacGyver
MacGyver
programme.sub-title: Barn Find + Engine Oil + La Punzonatura + Lab Rats + Tachometer
programme.desc:
MacGyver: Created by Lee David Zlotoff, Peter M. Lenkov, Paul Downs Colaizzo, Brett Mahoney. With Lucas Till, Tristin Mays, Justin Hires, Meredith Eaton. Young Angus "Mac" MacGyver works for a clandestine organization within the U.S. government, relying on his unconventional problem-solving skills to save lives." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1399045/","name":"MacGyver","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg1NzUzNmQtMWI2ZC00YzdlLWI5ZTgtMGM3MjJlZTgwYTVlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTIzMzY2NDQ2._V1_.jpg","description":"Young Angus "Mac" MacGyver works for a clandestine organization within the U.S. government, relying on his unconventional problem-solving skills to save lives.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1399045/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"nakrugt"},"dateCreated":"2021-10-20","inLanguage":"English","name":"Just finished watching the show","reviewBody":"Currently watching Season 3 Episode 17, and I have not made up my mind yet.

First off, things I like:

On-screen titles: They are hilarious, to be honest. You should read them. Each and every one of them.

Characters: To be honest, MacGyver in this version is much more likeable. In the 1980s version, he was too arrogant to like. The team (just like the Team Flash) is nice to watch.

Self-awareness: The producers, the cast and the writers do not take themselves too seriously. So, it is fun to watch.

Things I do not like: the science, the convenient ingredients for everything, characters too fast to forgive others.

I will finish the series, though.

Edit: I finished the show.

I hope PrimeVideo or Netflix would pick up the show in the future for 10-episode seasons with a proper finale.

Also, I liked each and every cameo form the cast of LOST; Jin, Ethan, Naomi, the lady that got shot by Mikhail, and, of course, Hurley. I especially hoped that Hurley would say goodbye "see you in another life, brotha!" to Desmond, but he didn't.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":20051,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.4},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Adventure","Drama"],"datePublished":"2016-09-23","keywords":"character name as series title,surname as series title,one word series title,urban adventure,timeframe 2010s","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1395771/","name":"Lucas Till"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1159702/","name":"Tristin Mays"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2058713/","name":"Justin Hires"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0314692/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0504531/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0173285/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0957453/","name":"Lee David Zlotoff"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0006997/","name":"Peter M. First off, things I like:

On-screen titles: They are hilarious, to be honest. You should read them. Each and every one of them.

Characters: To be honest, MacGyver in this version is much more likeable. In the 1980s version, he was too arrogant to like. The team (just like the Team Flash) is nice to watch.

Self-awareness: The producers, the cast and the writers do not take themselves too seriously. So, it is fun to watch.

Things I do not like: the science, the convenient ingredients for everything, characters too fast to forgive others.

I will finish the series, though.

Edit: I finished the show.

I hope PrimeVideo or Netflix would pick up the show in the future for 10-episode seasons with a proper finale.

Also, I liked each and every cameo form the cast of LOST; Jin, Ethan, Naomi, the lady that got shot by Mikhail, and, of course, Hurley. With Lucas Till, Tristin Mays, Justin Hires, Meredith Eaton. Young Angus "Mac" MacGyver works for a clandestine organization within the U.S. government, relying on his unconventional problem-solving skills to save lives." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1399045/","name":"MacGyver","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg1NzUzNmQtMWI2ZC00YzdlLWI5ZTgtMGM3MjJlZTgwYTVlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTIzMzY2NDQ2._V1_.jpg","description":"Young Angus "Mac" MacGyver works for a clandestine organization within the U.S. government, relying on his unconventional problem-solving skills to save lives.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1399045/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"nakrugt","dateCreated":"2021-10-20","inLanguage":"English","name":"Just finished watching the show","reviewBody":"Currently watching Season 3 Episode 17, and I have not made up my mind yet.

First off, things I like:

On-screen titles: They are hilarious, to be honest. You should read them. Each and every one of them.

Characters: To be honest, MacGyver in this version is much more likeable. In the 1980s version, he was too arrogant to like. The team (just like the Team Flash) is nice to watch.

Self-awareness: The producers, the cast and the writers do not take themselves too seriously. So, it is fun to watch.

Things I do not like: the science, the convenient ingredients for everything, characters too fast to forgive others.

I will finish the series, though.

Edit: I finished the show.

I hope PrimeVideo or Netflix would pick up the show in the future for 10-episode seasons with a proper finale.

Also, I liked each and every cameo form the cast of LOST; Jin, Ethan, Naomi, the lady that got shot by Mikhail, and, of course, Hurley. I especially hoped that Hurley would say goodbye "see you in another life, brotha!" to Desmond, but he didn't.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":20051,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.4,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Adventure","Drama"],"datePublished":"2016-09-23","keywords":"character name as series title,surname as series title,one word series title,urban adventure,timeframe 2010s","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1395771/","name":"Lucas Till","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1159702/","name":"Tristin Mays","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2058713/","name":"Justin Hires"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0314692/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0504531/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0173285/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0957453/","name":"Lee David Zlotoff","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0006997/","name":"Peter M. programme.title: CSI: Miami
CSI: Miami
programme.desc:
CSI: Miami: Created by Ann Donahue, Carol Mendelsohn, Anthony E. Zuiker. With David Caruso, Emily Procter, Adam Rodriguez, Rex Linn. The cases of the Miami-Dade, Florida police department's Crime Scene Investigations unit." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0313043/","name":"CSI: Miami","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTU3ZTI5ZGEtYjhiMy00ODU4LTgyM2UtNDhlYjBhMjc4MjIwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTYzMDM0NTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"The cases of the Miami-Dade, Florida police department's Crime Scene Investigations unit.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0313043/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"eamon-hennedy"},"dateCreated":"2003-10-28","inLanguage":"English","name":"Not as good as original, but still worth watching.","reviewBody":"Spin-off shows are very strange television projects. In some cases they work, like Angel which has become a show of its own. On the other hand the Star Trek spin-offs (more so the later ones) have becoming mere clones of the show they have spawned from. It is difficult to make it work. You can try and be different and the fan base from the originating show could hate you. Be too similar and the counter effect it that many will call it nothing but a clone. While CSI:Miami is more or less the same show as CSI:Crime Scene Investigation it is still a series that is well worth watching and most of it is down to the reasons that the originating series was worth watching. Fantastic writing, feature film production values and a good cast. While in Crime Scene Investigation the casting is first class here were are merely in good territory. The cast here don't seem to share the same chemistry as Grissom and friends, although whether or not this is deliberate I'm not sure.

With regards to casting what they do have in common is a superb central male lead. David Caruso is a fine actor, was so in the first season of NYPD Blue. Here he is incredible. Unlike Grissom, Horatio Crane (the best name ever for the main character in a television show) is more speculative, he will be more open to hunches than just considering the evidence. The manner in which is delivers his dialog is controlled mannered. If Grissom is the Fox Mulder of CSI, then Crane is undoubtedly the Frank Black. The supporting actors themselves are very good. Kim Delaney was watchable if a little too glossy while former West Wing actress Emily Procter once again brings a wealth of quirky charm that she likewise did with Ainsley in the White House drama.

Of course the biggest change here is the location. Instead of the bright lights of Las Vegas we have the sun shine of Miami. Ironically whereas Crime Scene Investigation would be predominantly set during night time, Miami is set more in the day light hours and with it comes a higher level of violence. In Ireland the channel that broadcasts the show frequently put out a warning before hand, something that never befalls the originating series. What we get here are episodes involving body parts falling of out dead sharks, scenes of autopsies that are more graphic and stories that are slightly more darker (the show itself is broadcast at 10pm in America).

While the show is no Angel it isn't Star Trek:Voyager either. It is hugely entertaining and the stories are frequently entertaining and well produced. What it lacks though is the warmness of the Las Vegas team. Horatio, in the same way as Frank Black, is less emotional and more controlled over his thoughts, whereas the Las Vegas equivalent would be putting heart and soul into the cases they were fighting for. In saying that the show is still worth watching and is perhaps the first step in what is looking like a growing franchise."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":55781,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2002-09-23","keywords":"place name in title,city name in title,city in title,united states of america,usa","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000325/","name":"David Caruso"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0698346/","name":"Emily Procter"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0735226/","name":"Adam Rodriguez"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0054762/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0183875/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0048735/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0231929/","name":"Ann Donahue"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0578856/","name":"Carol Mendelsohn"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0958499/","name":"Anthony E. Zuiker"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"CSI: Miami: Complete Season 8","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi320379929","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWU1NzhhNjItMzQ5ZC00YmFmLWEwMmYtMWVlMjFkNjdkZGNiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWU1NzhhNjItMzQ5ZC00YmFmLWEwMmYtMWVlMjFkNjdkZGNiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for CSI: Miami - Complete Season 08"}}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 0313043, Title: CSI: Miami, --- Description: CSI: Miami: Created by Ann Donahue, Carol Mendelsohn, Anthony E. Zuiker. With David Caruso, Emily Procter, Adam Rodriguez, Rex Linn. The cases of the Miami-Dade, Florida police department's Crime Scene Investigations unit." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0313043/","name":"CSI: Miami","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTU3ZTI5ZGEtYjhiMy00ODU4LTgyM2UtNDhlYjBhMjc4MjIwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTYzMDM0NTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"The cases of the Miami-Dade, Florida police department's Crime Scene Investigations unit.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0313043/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"eamon-hennedy","dateCreated":"2003-10-28","inLanguage":"English","name":"Not as good as original, but still worth watching.","reviewBody":"Spin-off shows are very strange television projects. In some cases they work, like Angel which has become a show of its own. On the other hand the Star Trek spin-offs (more so the later ones) have becoming mere clones of the show they have spawned from. It is difficult to make it work. You can try and be different and the fan base from the originating show could hate you. Be too similar and the counter effect it that many will call it nothing but a clone. While CSI:Miami is more or less the same show as CSI:Crime Scene Investigation it is still a series that is well worth watching and most of it is down to the reasons that the originating series was worth watching. Fantastic writing, feature film production values and a good cast. While in Crime Scene Investigation the casting is first class here were are merely in good territory. The cast here don't seem to share the same chemistry as Grissom and friends, although whether or not this is deliberate I'm not sure.

With regards to casting what they do have in common is a superb central male lead. David Caruso is a fine actor, was so in the first season of NYPD Blue. Here he is incredible. Unlike Grissom, Horatio Crane (the best name ever for the main character in a television show) is more speculative, he will be more open to hunches than just considering the evidence. The manner in which is delivers his dialog is controlled mannered. If Grissom is the Fox Mulder of CSI, then Crane is undoubtedly the Frank Black. The supporting actors themselves are very good. Kim Delaney was watchable if a little too glossy while former West Wing actress Emily Procter once again brings a wealth of quirky charm that she likewise did with Ainsley in the White House drama.

Of course the biggest change here is the location. Instead of the bright lights of Las Vegas we have the sun shine of Miami. Ironically whereas Crime Scene Investigation would be predominantly set during night time, Miami is set more in the day light hours and with it comes a higher level of violence. In Ireland the channel that broadcasts the show frequently put out a warning before hand, something that never befalls the originating series. What we get here are episodes involving body parts falling of out dead sharks, scenes of autopsies that are more graphic and stories that are slightly more darker (the show itself is broadcast at 10pm in America).

While the show is no Angel it isn't Star Trek:Voyager either. It is hugely entertaining and the stories are frequently entertaining and well produced. What it lacks though is the warmness of the Las Vegas team. Horatio, in the same way as Frank Black, is less emotional and more controlled over his thoughts, whereas the Las Vegas equivalent would be putting heart and soul into the cases they were fighting for. In saying that the show is still worth watching and is perhaps the first step in what is looking like a growing franchise.","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":55781,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2002-09-23","keywords":"place name in title,city name in title,city in title,united states of america,usa","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000325/","name":"David Caruso","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0698346/","name":"Emily Procter","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0735226/","name":"Adam Rodriguez"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0054762/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0183875/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0048735/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0231929/","name":"Ann Donahue","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0578856/","name":"Carol Mendelsohn","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0958499/","name":"Anthony E. Zuiker"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"CSI: Miami: Complete Season 8","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi320379929","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWU1NzhhNjItMzQ5ZC00YmFmLWEwMmYtMWVlMjFkNjdkZGNiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWU1NzhhNjItMzQ5ZC00YmFmLWEwMmYtMWVlMjFkNjdkZGNiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for CSI: Miami - Complete Season 08"</script><metacontent=" --- Director: Sam Hill, Joe Chappelle, Scott Lautanen, Karen Gaviola, Matt Earl Beesley

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation
CSI: Crime Sob Investigação
programme.desc: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation: Created by Anthony E. Zuiker. With George Eads, Eric Szmanda, Robert David Hall, Paul Guilfoyle. Series following an elite team of police forensic evidence investigation experts as they work their cases in Las Vegas." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0247082/","name":"CSI: Crime Scene Investigation","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjRlZjFmNTktYzg0ZC00OWJlLWJlN2EtOGQ1OTRiOTFiMWE3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTA4NzY1MzY@._V1_.jpg","description":"Series following an elite team of police forensic evidence investigation experts as they work their cases in Las Vegas.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0247082/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"kidcurry1967"},"dateCreated":"2000-12-07","inLanguage":"English","name":"Outstanding!!!","reviewBody":"C.S.I. is the best new show of the 2000 season! William L. Petersen is the coolest of the cool as Gil Grissom. I've followed his career since I first saw him in To Live and Die in L.A. He's an amazing actor and he heads up a cast of amazing actors as well. This show really keeps you on the edge of your seat as the investigators literally take a crime scene that appears to leave them with nothing to go on. The investigators take nothing and turn it into something amazing as each crime is solved right in front of you and you as the viewer, never see it coming! Wow! I hope this is one show CBS will pick up year after year!"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":81434,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2000-10-06","keywords":"crime scene investigation,las vegas nevada,crime lab,police,detective","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000401/","name":"Laurence Fishburne"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001339/","name":"Marg Helgenberger"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0247040/","name":"George Eads"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0054762/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0183875/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0048735/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0958499/","name":"Anthony E. Zuiker"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"CSI: Season 1","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2534388761","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODk2MmYxYTEtNjljNC00MGYwLWJkOWMtZDZjMmFlMjc5YzhjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODk2MmYxYTEtNjljNC00MGYwLWJkOWMtZDZjMmFlMjc5YzhjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer"}}</script><metacontent="

Series following an elite team of police forensic evidence investigation experts as they work their cases in Las Vegas." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0247082/","name":"CSI: Crime Scene Investigation","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjRlZjFmNTktYzg0ZC00OWJlLWJlN2EtOGQ1OTRiOTFiMWE3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTA4NzY1MzY@._V1_.jpg","description":"Series following an elite team of police forensic evidence investigation experts as they work their cases in Las Vegas.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0247082/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"kidcurry1967"},"dateCreated":"2000-12-07","inLanguage":"English","name":"Outstanding!!!","reviewBody":"C.S.I. is the best new show of the 2000 season! William L. Petersen is the coolest of the cool as Gil Grissom. I've followed his career since I first saw him in To Live and Die in L.A. He's an amazing actor and he heads up a cast of amazing actors as well. This show really keeps you on the edge of your seat as the investigators literally take a crime scene that appears to leave them with nothing to go on. The investigators take nothing and turn it into something amazing as each crime is solved right in front of you and you as the viewer, never see it coming! Wow! I hope this is one show CBS will pick up year after year!"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":81434,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2000-10-06","keywords":"crime scene investigation,las vegas nevada,crime lab,police,detective","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000401/","name":"Laurence Fishburne"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001339/","name":"Marg Helgenberger"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0247040/","name":"George Eads"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0054762/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0183875/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0048735/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0958499/","name":"Anthony E.
